text: Events from the year 1766 in Canada. ==Incumbents== *Monarch: George III ===Governors=== *Governor of the Province of Quebec: James Murray *Governor of Nova Scotia: Montague Wilmot *Commodore-Governor of Newfoundland: Hugh Palliser ==Events== * March 18 â€“ The Stamp Act is repealed. ==Births== ==Deaths== == References == Canada 66
title: 1766 in Canada
